replies.msg:
Conflicting Arsenal-Rugani reports
By Football Italia staff

Reports in England suggest Arsenal have abandoned talks for Juventus defender Daniele Rugani, but in Italy they insist it’s still on for €30m.

There are conflicting rumours surrounding the fate of the centre-back, who has fallen down the pecking order at Juve with the arrival of Matthijs de Ligt and Merih Demiral.

A two-year loan offer was seemingly rejected and talks broke down, but now Tuttosport are claiming a one-season loan with obligation to buy in June 2020 for €30m is still possible.

The 25-year-old has seemingly agreed personal terms with Arsenal, having also been linked with Wolverhampton Wanderers.
